database.name: VIEW EFIN_PAYMENTOUT_BANK_V
database.view: SELECT ba.c_bp_bankaccount_id AS efin_paymentout_bank_v_id, ba.ad_client_id, ba.ad_org_id, ba.isactive, ba.created, ba.createdby, ba.updated, ba.updatedby, COALESCE(ba.iban, '') AS name, ba.c_bpartner_id AS bpartner, ba.em_efin_bank_id AS bank FROM c_bp_bankaccount ba
